name: REBOOT (itch) (MeNicholas)
description: """ WE'VE PROGRESSED TOO FAST, WE WERE NOT READY FOR THIS... OUR CREATION, THE PERFECT AI, HAS TAKEN OVER THE WORLD INSTEAD OF HELPING US... ONE BY ONE, IT WILL TAKE US OUT OF OUR OWN WORLD...  YEARS OF FIGHTING IT, WE ARE TIRED...  BUT THERE'S STILL ONE THING WE CAN TRY... TAKE OVER THE PLACE WHERE IT ALL STARTED... DEFEAT IT AND LET THEM KNOW! """
